statements: SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, log_message FROM log_data WHERE server_id = 10;
SELECT AVG(server_id) AS avg_server_id FROM log_data;
SELECT MIN(log_timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp FROM log_data;
SELECT DISTINCT server_id FROM log_data ORDER BY server_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM log_data WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM log_data GROUP BY server_id;
SELECT DISTINCT server_id FROM log_data WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT server_id, SUBSTRING(log_message, 1, 20) AS short_message FROM log_data WHERE LENGTH(log_message) > 20;
SELECT server_id, HOUR(log_timestamp) AS log_hour, COUNT(*) AS hour_count FROM log_data GROUP BY server_id, log_hour ORDER BY server_id, log_hour;
SELECT * FROM server_logs WHERE server_id = 1;
SELECT server_id, log_timestamp, log_content FROM server_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY server_id;
SELECT server_id, MAX(memory_usage) AS max_memory_usage FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY server_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE disk_usage > 50 ORDER BY disk_usage DESC;
SELECT server_id, log_content, log_timestamp FROM server_logs WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_timestamp, server_id, log_content FROM server_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND server_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT server_id, log_content FROM server_logs WHERE log_content LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY server_id ASC, log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM server_logs GROUP BY server_id HAVING log_count > 10 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT server_id, SUM(cpu_usage) AS total_cpu_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE server_id = 3 GROUP BY server_id HAVING total_cpu_usage > 1000 ORDER BY total_cpu_usage DESC;
SELECT server_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM server_logs WHERE server_name = 'server1';
SELECT * FROM server_metrics ORDER BY metric_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(response_time) AS avg_response_time FROM server_performance WHERE performance_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT server_name, MAX(cpu_usage) AS max_cpu_usage FROM server_metrics GROUP BY server_name HAVING max_cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM server_logs;
SELECT server_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM server_logs WHERE server_name = 'Server A' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT server_name, metric_timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM server_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 80 ORDER BY metric_timestamp ASC;
SELECT server_name, performance_timestamp, response_time, throughput FROM server_performance WHERE throughput < 1000 ORDER BY performance_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT server_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM server_logs WHERE server_name = 'Server B' AND log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT server_name, metric_timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM server_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 70 ORDER BY memory_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM servers_logs;
SELECT server_name, server_ip FROM servers WHERE server_location = 'US';
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM servers_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT server_id, AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY server_id;
SELECT MAX(memory_usage) AS max_memory_usage, MIN(memory_usage) AS min_memory_usage FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM servers_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT server_name, server_ip, server_location FROM servers WHERE server_location = 'USA';
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM servers_logs WHERE server_id = 1 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(cpu_usage), MAX(memory_usage) FROM performance_metrics WHERE server_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM servers;
SELECT server_name, location FROM servers ORDER BY server_name DESC;
SELECT ip_address, location FROM servers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT server_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-09-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM servers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT server_name, ip_address FROM servers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT server_name, location FROM servers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT server_id, error_timestamp, error_message FROM errors WHERE server_id = 2 ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC;
